reviewText: I thought I was buying episodes from the first season but they were from different years.  The sound quality on most were not very good.  A lot of cracklings.
this is a time-less series that i never get sick of.  the characters are great and pernell is so easy on the eyes.

Simply put: Do not buy this or any other bootleg set that does NOT have the original music but DOES have inferior picture and sound quality. Buy BONANZA: The Official First Season and BONANZA: The Official Second Season vol. 1 released by CBS Paramount; these are the ONLY seasonal sets licensed by Bonanza Ventures and NBC Universal. You'll get all the episodes in this set plus more episodes from the first two seasons, plus great extras including photo galleries, trailers, interviews with creator-producer David Dortort and more. And all the episodes are un-cut, have the original music (including the classic theme song) and look great because they are re-mastered from the original film elements. BONANZA -- the Real Deal -- Rocks! And if you still want official BONANZA for less money -- avoid the bootlegs! -- and get The Best of BONANZA put out by Artisan several years ago. No extras, but the episodes have great picture and sound quality and are complete and uncut.

I love Bonanza; I am so happy that they are brought back the old shows, which I use to watch as a childbed. It's great that they putting the old movie's on DVD. Some day they will be worth something. Plus you can hand down to your kid's and they can pass them down to their children as well... This way our history don't get forgot about...
That You.
Thebratnv01
